CBD.preprocessing package¶

The preprocessing package contains a set of modules and functionalities to allow for preprocessing a model in order to simulate it. This feature is up to the user, who may identify the use of preprocessing, depending on the importance of the maintainability of a model.

Submodules¶

  • CBD.preprocessing.butcher module
  • CBD.preprocessing.rungekutta module
